Question
========

When setting up an experiment, a researcher wants to make sure that he maximizes the probability of a significant result. TRUE what should he pay attention to?

Answerlist
----------

* That the measurement of the independent variable is reliable.
* That there is no observer bias.
* That the measurement of the dependent variable is reliable.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* That the measurement of the independent variable is reliable...: Incorrect
* That there is no observer bias: Incorrect
* That the measurement of the dependent variable is reliable...: Correct
